goals__remit:
CapoTrave / Kilowatt is a theater production company, it is center of productions and production supports, a residence of creation, a place open to experimental music, contemporary literature and visual arts. 
Kilowatt is a festival dedicated to the new companies of the contemporary scene (theatre, dance, music, literature, performing and visual arts); it takes place in Sansepolcro (Tuscany) during the summer. The festival was conceived in 2003 and since then it has been promoted and implemented by the company CapoTrave. The “Visionaries Selection” was created in 2007. 
From 2008 Kilowatt Festival has supported theatre, dance and performing arts productions. Since 2009 the festival has opened a contemporary music section, and the year after a visual arts section. In 2010 Kilowatt won the Ubu Prize, the most important prize of the Italian theatre.
relevant_communication: CapoTrave Kilowatt created the network Be SpectACTive, financed by EU from 2014 since 2018, in the framework of Creative Europe, among the Large Scale Cooperation Projects.
